page.title: 09ENTERTAINMENT MUSIC BANDS
page.content: Due to its comparative isolation in the past Shotts has a tradition of self made music. At present there are three bands: - The Shotts and Dykehead Pipe Band - The P and D Windows Band (formerly St.Patrick's silver Band) - The Dykehead Amateur Flute Band. The Pipe band has a very successful history,having won championships up to and including world level.The P.and D band also competes well at national level.The Flute band maintains a high standard and has wider repertoire than most. Calderhead High School runs a pupils band.
